DOC.brief_title: Cumulative Live Birth Rates Patients With Repeated Implantation Failure ( RIF ) Undergoing Preimplantation Genetic Screening ( PGS )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : woman < 39 year repeat implantation failure : least 4 day 3 good quality embryos 2 good quality blastocyst transfer without implantation Exclusion criterion : partner severe male factor , abnormal sperm Fluorescence situ hybridization ( FISH ) analysis presence uni bilateral hydrosalpinx , uterine malformation , thrombophilia , uncontrolled thyroid disfunction autoimmune disease
